assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Edelweiss Financial Services Limited provides financial products and services to individuals and institutions in India. It offers retail credit products, such as home loans, SME and business loans, loans against shares, and agricultural and rural finance; corporate credit products, including structured collateralized credit and wholesale mortgage; and distressed credit. The company also provides personal and private wealth management services; asset management products and services comprising mutual funds, alternate asset advisory, multi strategy funds, and distressed assets resolution; and capital markets services that include investment banking, institutional equities, forex and rates, asset, and financial product distribution services. In addition, it offers life and general insurance products. The company was formerly known as Edelweiss Capital Limited and changed its name to Edelweiss Financial Services Limited in August 2011. Edelweiss Financial Services Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India.
